page.content: cont..They work a 7 day week in the quarry and 24hr shift working at the plant.They process over 1 million tons of rock each year. ULCEBY VALE QUARRY.Started in 1906 to provide chalk for the construction of Immingham Docks by rail,also active in WW 2. Recently it supplied 42,000 tons of rock for the A180.It supplies the Humber bank industries,& agriculture. One man is employed, he operates the weighbridge and hires plant and labour as orders require. FREEDOM PETROLEUM LTD and MAJOR OIL CO.LTD are both involved in the stor- age and distribution of oil products. The Lindsey Oil Refinery came on stream in 1967, in 69 the depots came. From here they supply;heavy fuel oil, motor spirit,derv,gas oil & kerosine. They bridge large loads to 8 surround- ing counties& customers inthe Midlands
